My wish?
\0 I wanna know my friends

\0(
(촀\0Red's strawberry, yellow's lemon,

watering can are way smaller

(촀\0Didja know that rainbows show up

( 촀\0Whoa, two rainbows?
\0( (촀\0I didn't know

\0(9촀\0
Huh. I hope nothing's brokenn

(촀\0When I see a double rainbow,

each other and are just chilling.

(촀\0I wanna take a picture of the

\0( But (촀\0I can't remember

A big curtain of light across the skyn\0\0
\0(
(촀\0Man, I usually only see stuff like that
(촀\0if I've been awake for a couple days!

(촀\0I want a curtain made of lights in

like plane footprints!

(9촀\0Doesn't the moon remind you of

\0( All yellow and roundn\0\0

\0Oh! 
\0((촀\0Big, buttery PANCAKES!

( 촀\0Is it true the moon is made of

\0(
we'd have (촀\0ALL THE CHEESE?

(:촀\0The moon is round like a pizza, and
